Aug. 10, 1907 D Grangetown Contest
Grangetown Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Grangetown Contest grangetown-contest
None
Il Trovatore [unknown arranger]
Grangetown, North Yorkshire Promoted by Cleveland Steelworks band.1st prize £8 and cup, 2nd prize £4, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1 divided between South Bank and Dorman Long Redcar Works. March contest 1st Guisborough Priory, 2nd Middlesbrough Borough. 5 bands competed
April 4, 2012, 2:36 p.m. Sept. 20, 2018, 9:11 a.m.
1 Skinningrove Miners Prize Silver Band William Layman
2 Middlesbrough Borough William Heap
3 Guisborough Priory William Holdsworth
4 South Bank Israel Almond
4 Dorman's Redcar Works T. Winter
